prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Book files use the .book extension and UTF-8 non-BOM encoding, leveraging version control systems like git.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: book files, .book extension, UTF-8, non-BOM encoding, version control systems, git
